column4: the program that you use to get into irc (pidgin, mibbit, xchat, and others I never used yet) is what sets the nick you have when you initiate irc and sign into the server.  I would guess that somehow you are not saving the setting for the nick. --- I also suggest that you go into terminal and do  -- sudo apt-get install xchat2  -- this is my choice for ease. sudokill
(amendmended: I would guess that someone who fails at that having the nick they want at login is not _saving_ the setting for the nick inside of the program that gets her or him onto IRC.
I copied text to guest-whatever which made what I told you awkward
look I found something. maybe I can do it anyway. thanks for telling me about "scanned text". http://www.google.com/search?aq=f&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&q=scanned+pdf
